column5:
Hey, it's easy to look back at things and blame yourself. But, it's not your fault. You aren't psychic, you couldn't predict you had covid.

A doctor deliberately destroyed my life by conning me into a surgery I didn't need just to further his career. He destroyed my body to the point where I am now awaiting assisted suicide bc I can't function anymore. In this case, it was his fault and he doesn't care. 

So, as a person driven to suicide because of a healthcare workers mistake, I can tell you that it was not your fault. You were pressured by your industry to show up to work and there's no way you could predict a cough turning into covid.
You could pm me, I don't want to say on the public board
